meanings.definition: The married woman in a relationship with a man.
meanings.sent1: The wives prepared a delicious meal for their husbands.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor has three wives, and they are all very kind.
meanings.sent3: The wives giggled as they planned a surprise party for their husbands.
meanings.sent4: The city was like a web of interconnected lives, with wives at the center of each family.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wives dancing joyfully at the wedding will forever stay in my memory.

meanings.sent1: The sisters were all wives, each with a unique personality.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the wives of the knights played a crucial role in the kingdom's history.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly referred to themselves as the 'wives club'.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with colorful flowers, each one representing a different wife.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed ancient artifacts belonging to the wives of the pharaohs.
